div.style: id:-1; position: absolute; Rect: 20 20 120 120; background-color: white;

tabcontrol.style: id:-1; position: absolute; Rect : 20 20 100 100; Enabled:true; Border:false; FillBackground:false; TabHeight:20; TabMaxWidth:100px; TabVerticalAlignment:upperLeft;

tab.style: id:-1; Rect: 20 20 50 50; TabNumber:0; DrawBackground:true; BackColor: #999999; Caption:Tab1;
id:-1; Rect: 20 20 30 50; TabNumber:1; DrawBackground:true; BackColor: pink; Caption:Tab2;
